title: IBalloonOptions.LowerText
description: Gets and sets the lower text of the balloon.
remarks:
This property is valid only when
IBalloonOptions::Style
is set to
swBalloonStyle_e
.swBS_SplitCirc.
You can only get or set the lower text in a BOM balloon using
INote::GetBomBalloonText
or
INote::SetBomBalloonText
after
inserting a BOM balloon
.
See the SOLIDWORKS Help for additional details about balloons.
